item.description:
If you haven't had a chance to try this method of freeing up your artistic soul, now is your chance! We'll be doing the exercise out of Suzanne Simanaitis' Kaleidoscope book to get us movin' and groovin' in our artistic endeavors. Come join us!

For questions or comments relating to any of the workshops, please post them on the message board or feel free to email Rozsi, Pat or Martha through the website.

We'll post the materials list as we get closer to the date of the event, so stay tuned.

Rozsi

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Mail Art to Self redux
